welcome_benefits: Get 50% of the Joining Fee Back as a PhonePe Gift Card on Your First RuPay Credit Card UPI Transaction, and the Remaining 50% as 10 Gift Cards on Continued UPI Spends

Rewards Rate: 10 RPs/₹100 on Select PhonePe Spends Like Recharges, Bill Payments, Movies, Hotels, Utilities, and More. 5 RPs/₹100 on Brands Like Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, Ajio, and More. 1 RP/₹100 on Scan & Pay UPI Spends
Reward Redemption: 1 Reward Point = ₹1 (Redemption Against Statement). 1 Reward Point = ₹0.30 When Redeemed for Airmiles, Product Catalogue or Smartbuy
Domestic Lounge Access: 2 Lounge Visits Each Quarter on Spends of ₹75,000 or More

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal Fee Waiver on Annual Spends of ₹2 Lakh or More
fees_charges.Rewards Redemption Fee: No Charges for Reward Point Redemption Against Statement
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver on Transactions Between ₹400 and ₹5,000 (Maximum ₹250 Each Statement Cycle)

product_details: The PhonePe HDFC Bank Ultimo Credit Card is the ideal credit card for making utility bill payments, spending via PhonePe, and UPI payments.
Apart from all the savings via PhonePe, cardholders can also earn 5% Reward Points on popular online platforms like Flipkart, Amazon, Ajio, Swiggy, Zomato, and more.
One can take advantage of free airport lounge access and relax before their journey.
1% fuel surcharge waiver allows cardholders to refuel their vehicles without having to pay extra.
